events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund because it does not match the description on your website.
The issue has been categorized under refund as the customer is requesting a money back due to receiving the wrong item.
Assigning this refund request to the refund department to handle the customer's case promptly.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand your concern about the wrong product and I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a picture of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 789654 and I attached a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid shipping label to return the incorrect product.
Thank you for your quick response and the refund solution. I appreciate the prepaid label for the return as well.
Your refund has been initiated and you will receive the shipping label via email shortly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your efficient support and communication throughout the process.
We are glad your issue has been resolved. Closing this case now. Thank you for choosing us and have a great day!
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback is valuable to improve our service.
